Articles.Content: Hello Johncasual here. Not long ago i stumbled across this amazing game after 2 days of the demo i decided it was worth purchasing.. After 100 or so attempts i finally landed on the Mun.. the last few days i been perfecting my Mun landings..currently i have 2 ships and one command module on the Mun, and 2 satelittes in orbit around Kerbin with in a 300 m of each other. this is my first post.. and i just want to says Thank You for creating such a wonderful game, i cant wait to see what content you bring.. congrats to c7 jenkins on being the newest member of the ksp team.

Welcome to the forums. I hope everyone treats you farly and vice versa. Have a good time

GroundHOG2010

Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay!

You did better than me at landing on the Mun, it took me like 2 months to get to the Mun.

-Mincespy

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
